title: Redesign login page to match video reference style

requirements.text: Redesign the LoginPage component (frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx) to match the visual style and layout shown in the provided video reference, updating the layout structure, color scheme, typography, spacing, and component arrangement while preserving the Internet Identity authentication functionality and existing feature highlights

quotes: Make login page like this video

acceptanceCriteria: Login page visual design closely matches the reference video style
Layout, colors, typography, and spacing reflect the video design
Internet Identity login functionality remains intact
Page is responsive and works on mobile and desktop
All existing feature highlights are preserved or adapted to new design

constraints: Do not change the authentication mechanism (Internet Identity must remain)
Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts or frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx
Maintain compatibility with existing warm color palette (avoid blue and purple)
nonGoals: Changing the authentication system from Internet Identity to username/password
Adding new login features or functionality not shown in the video
Modifying other pages or components beyond the login page
